aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Hi, I'm Marco from Bernau near Berlin – fascinated by the diversity of life and the boundless world of IT. What drives me is the opportunity to transform creative ideas into visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications that inspire people.
aboutMe.philosophy: For me, programming is more than just code: it's the art of finding smart solutions and creating something simple and intuitive out of complex challenges. I love combining technology with creativity and bringing projects to life.
aboutMe.workStyle: Whether in the office or remotely, I work with focus and flexibility and enjoy shared success. For me, teamwork means fitting together like a puzzle piece: working together to create something great that is more than the sum of its parts. Always open to new ideas and challenges, I am constantly expanding my knowledge and skills.
